sentences.zh: 中宮天極星，其一明者，太一常居也；

translations.text: The central palace Tianji star, the one bright one is where Taiyi constantly resides;
beside three stars the three dukes, or called the heir apparent.

sentences.zh: 後句四星，末大星正妃，餘三星後宮之屬也。

translations.text: Behind the hook four stars, the last big star is the principal wife, the remaining three stars are the rear palace attendants.
Surrounding it guarding twelve stars, the feudal lords.
All called Zi Palace.

The central palace Tianji star, the one bright one is where Taiyi constantly resides; beside three stars the three dukes, or called the heir apparent. Behind the hook four stars, the last big star is the principal wife, the remaining three stars are the rear palace attendants. Surrounding it guarding twelve stars, the feudal lords. All called Zi Palace.

sentences.zh: 前列直斗口三星，隨北端兌，若見若不，曰陰德，或曰天一。

translations.text: In front arrayed straight at the Dipper mouth three stars, following the north end, appearing and disappearing, called Yin De, or called Tian Yi.

sentences.zh: 紫宮左三星曰天槍，右五星曰天棓，後六星絕漢抵營室，曰閣道。

translations.text: Zi Palace left three stars called Tian Qiang, right five stars called Tian Bang, behind six stars crossing the Han reaching Ying Shi, called Ge Dao.

In front arrayed straight at the Dipper mouth three stars, following the north end, appearing and disappearing, called Yin De, or called Tian Yi. Zi Palace left three stars called Tian Qiang, right five stars called Tian Bang, behind six stars crossing the Han reaching Ying Shi, called Ge Dao.

sentences.zh: 北斗七星，所謂「旋、璣、玉衡以齊七政」。

translations.text: Big Dipper seven stars, the so-called 'whirling, jade, balance to regulate the seven governments'.

sentences.zh: 杓攜龍角，衡殷南斗，魁枕參首。

translations.text: The ladle carries the Dragon horn, the balance presses the Southern Dipper, the chief rests on Shen head.
Using dusk establishing the ladle;
the ladle, from Hua southwest.
Using midnight establishing the balance;
the balance, in Yin central states between He and Ji.
Using dawn establishing the chief;
the chief, Hai Dai northeast.

sentences.zh: 斗為帝車，運于中央，臨制四鄉。

translations.text: The Dipper is the emperor's chariot, operating in the center, overseeing and controlling the four directions.

sentences.zh: 分陰陽，建四時，均五行，移節度，定諸紀，皆系於斗。

translations.text: Divides yin and yang, establishes four seasons, balances five elements, shifts solar terms, determines various records, all depend on the Dipper.

Big Dipper seven stars, the so-called 'whirling, jade, balance to regulate the seven governments'. The ladle carries the Dragon horn, the balance presses the Southern Dipper, the chief rests on Shen head. Using dusk establishing the ladle; the ladle, from Hua southwest. Using midnight establishing the balance; the balance, in Yin central states between He and Ji. Using dawn establishing the chief; the chief, Hai Dai northeast. The Dipper is the emperor's chariot, operating in the center, overseeing and controlling the four directions. Divides yin and yang, establishes four seasons, balances five elements, shifts solar terms, determines various records, all depend on the Dipper.

sentences.zh: 斗魁戴匡六星曰文昌宮：一曰上將，二曰次將，三曰貴相，四曰司命，五曰司中，六曰司祿。

translations.text: The Dipper chief wears six stars in square called Wen Chang Palace: one called Shang Jiang, two called Ci Jiang, three called Gui Xiang, four called Si Ming, five called Si Zhong, six called Si Lu.
In the Dipper chief center, the noble person's prison.

sentences.zh: 魁下六星，兩兩相比者，名曰三能。

translations.text: Below the chief six stars, two by two opposite called San Neng.
San Neng colors equal, ruler and ministers harmonious;
not equal, perverse and contrary.
Fu star bright and close, auxiliary ministers intimate and strong;
distant and small, distant and weak.

The Dipper chief wears six stars in square called Wen Chang Palace: one called Shang Jiang, two called Ci Jiang, three called Gui Xiang, four called Si Ming, five called Si Zhong, six called Si Lu. In the Dipper chief center, the noble person's prison. Below the chief six stars, two by two opposite called San Neng. San Neng colors equal, ruler and ministers harmonious; not equal, perverse and contrary. Fu star bright and close, auxiliary ministers intimate and strong; distant and small, distant and weak.

sentences.zh: 杓端有兩星：一內為矛，招搖；

translations.text: Ladle end has two stars: one inside is spear, Zhao Yao;
one outside is shield, Tian Feng.

sentences.zh: 有句圜十五星，屬杓，曰賤人之牢。

translations.text: There is hooked circle fifteen stars, belonging to ladle, called lowly person's prison.

sentences.zh: 其牢中星實則囚多，虛則開出。

translations.text: Its prison middle star solid then prisoners many, empty then released.

Ladle end has two stars: one inside is spear, Zhao Yao; one outside is shield, Tian Feng. There is hooked circle fifteen stars, belonging to ladle, called lowly person's prison. Its prison middle star solid then prisoners many, empty then released.

sentences.zh: 天一、槍、棓、矛、盾動搖，角大，兵起。

translations.text: Tian Yi, Qiang, Bang, spear, shield move and shake, horns large, troops arise.
Tian Yi, Qiang, Bang, spear, shield move and shake, horns large, troops arise.
Eastern Palace Azure Dragon, Fang, Xin.

sentences.zh: 心為明堂，大星天王，前後星子屬。

translations.text: Xin is Ming Tang, big star Heavenly King, front and back stars heir attendants.
Does not want straight, straight then Heavenly King loses plans.
Fang is Fu, called Tian Si.
Its yin, right Can.
Beside has two stars called Jin;
north one star called Gong.
Northeast curved twelve stars called Qi.
Qi middle four stars Tian Shi;
middle six stars called Shi Lou.
Shi middle stars numerous then full;
its empty then depleted.
Fang south numerous stars called Qi Guan.

Eastern Palace Azure Dragon, Fang, Xin. Xin is Ming Tang, big star Heavenly King, front and back stars heir attendants. Does not want straight, straight then Heavenly King loses plans. Fang is Fu, called Tian Si. Its yin, right Can. Beside has two stars called Jin; north one star called Gong. Northeast curved twelve stars called Qi. Qi middle four stars Tian Shi; middle six stars called Shi Lou. Shi middle stars numerous then full; its empty then depleted. Fang south numerous stars called Qi Guan.
Left horn, Li;
right horn, Jiang.
Da Jiao is Heavenly King imperial court.

sentences.zh: 其兩旁各有三星，鼎足句之，曰攝提。

translations.text: Its two sides each have three stars, tripod feet hooking them, called She Ti.

sentences.zh: 攝提者，直斗杓所指，以建時節，故曰「攝提格」。

translations.text: She Ti means straight where Dipper ladle points, to establish seasonal nodes, therefore called 'She Ti Ge'.
Kang is Su Miao, governs illness.
Its north and south two big stars, called Nan Men.
Di is Tian Gen, governs epidemics.

Left horn, Li; right horn, Jiang. Da Jiao is Heavenly King imperial court. Its two sides each have three stars, tripod feet hooking them, called She Ti. She Ti means straight where Dipper ladle points, to establish seasonal nodes, therefore called 'She Ti Ge'. Kang is Su Miao, governs illness. Its north and south two big stars, called Nan Men. Di is Tian Gen, governs epidemics.
Wei is nine sons, called ruler and ministers;
distant and cut off, not harmonious.
Ji is Ao Ke, called mouth and tongue.
Wei is nine sons, called ruler and ministers; distant and cut off, not harmonious. Ji is Ao Ke, called mouth and tongue.
Fire violates guards horn, then there is battle.
Fang, Xin, kings dislike them.
Fire violates guards horn, then there is battle. Fang, Xin, kings dislike them.
Southern Palace Vermilion Bird, Quan, Heng.
Heng, Tai Wei, the three lights' court.
Guarding twelve stars, feudal lords: west, Jiang;
east, Xiang;
south four stars, law enforcers;
middle, Duan Men;
gate left and right, Ye Men.
Gate inside six stars, feudal lords.
Its inside five stars, five emperors seats.

sentences.zh: 後聚一十五星，蔚然，曰郎位；

translations.text: Behind gathered fifteen stars, flourishing, called Lang Wei;
beside one big star, Jiang Wei.

sentences.zh: 月、五星順入，軌道，司其出，所守，天子所誅也。

translations.text: Moon, five planets sequential enter, track the path, oversee their exit, what they guard, the Son of Heaven executes.

sentences.zh: 其逆入，若不軌道，以所犯命之；

translations.text: Their reverse enter, if not track the path, by what they violate name them;

sentences.zh: 中坐，成形，皆群下從謀也。

translations.text: middle sit, form shape, all the group below follows plotting.
Metal, fire especially severe.

sentences.zh: 廷藩西有隋星五，曰少微，士大夫。

translations.text: Court enclosure west has Sui stars five, called Shao Wei, scholars and officials.
Quan, Xuan Yuan.
Xuan Yuan, yellow dragon body.
Front big star, female lord image;
beside small stars, charioteer rear palace attendants.
Moon, five planets guard violate like Heng observation.

Southern Palace Vermilion Bird, Quan, Heng. Heng, Tai Wei, the three lights' court. Its inside five stars, five emperors seats. Behind gathered fifteen stars, flourishing, called Lang Wei; beside one big star, Jiang Wei. Moon, five planets sequential enter, track the path, oversee their exit, what they guard, the Son of Heaven executes. Front big star, female lord image; beside small stars, charioteer rear palace attendants. Moon, five planets guard violate like Heng observation.
Dong Jing governs water affairs.
Its west curved star called Yue.
Yue north, Bei He;
south, Nan He;
two rivers, Tian Que between is Guan Liang.
Yu Gui, governs ghost sacrifices;
middle white one is Zhi.

sentences.zh: 火守南北河，兵起，穀不登。

translations.text: Fire guards north south rivers, troops arise, grain does not ripen.

sentences.zh: 故德成衡，觀成潢，傷成鉞，禍成井，誅成質。

translations.text: Therefore virtue becomes Heng, observation becomes Huang, injury becomes Yue, calamity becomes Jing, execution becomes Zhi.

Dong Jing governs water affairs. Its west curved star called Yue. Yue north, Bei He; south, Nan He; two rivers, Tian Que between is Guan Liang. Yu Gui, governs ghost sacrifices; middle white one is Zhi. Fire guards north south rivers, troops arise, grain does not ripen. Therefore virtue becomes Heng, observation becomes Huang, injury becomes Yue, calamity becomes Jing, execution becomes Zhi.
Liu is Niao Zhu, governs wood and grass.
Seven stars, neck, are Yuan Guan.
Govern urgent matters.
Zhang, Su, are Chu, govern banquet guests.
Yi is Yu He, governs distant guests.
Liu is Niao Zhu, governs wood and grass. Seven stars, neck, are Yuan Guan. Govern urgent matters. Zhang, Su, are Chu, govern banquet guests. Yi is Yu He, governs distant guests.
Zhen is Che, governs wind.

sentences.zh: 其旁有一小星，曰長沙，星星不欲明；

translations.text: Its side has one small star, called Changsha, the star does not want brightness;

sentences.zh: 明與四星等，若五星入軫中，兵大起。

translations.text: bright equal to four stars, if five stars enter Zhen middle, troops greatly arise.
Zhen south numerous stars called Tian Ku Lou;
Ku has five Che.

sentences.zh: 車星角若益眾，及不具，無處車馬。

translations.text: Che star horns if increase numerous, and not complete, no place for carriages and horses.

Zhen is Che, governs wind. Its side has one small star, called Changsha, the star does not want brightness; bright equal to four stars, if five stars enter Zhen middle, troops greatly arise. Zhen south numerous stars called Tian Ku Lou; Ku has five Che. Che star horns if increase numerous, and not complete, no place for carriages and horses.
Western Palace Xian Chi, called Tian Wu Huang.
Wu Huang, five emperors' chariot shed.
Fire enters, drought;
metal, troops;
Moon, moon.
Middle has three pillars;
pillars not complete, troops arise.
Western Palace Xian Chi, called Tian Wu Huang. Wu Huang, five emperors' chariot shed. Fire enters, drought; metal, troops; Moon, moon. Middle has three pillars; pillars not complete, troops arise.
Kui called Feng Shi, governs ditches and drains.
Lou governs gathering crowds.
Wei is Tian Cang.
Its south numerous stars called Ao Ji.
Kui called Feng Shi, governs ditches and drains. Lou governs gathering crowds. Wei is Tian Cang. Its south numerous stars called Ao Ji.

sentences.zh: 昴曰髦頭，胡星也，為白衣會。

translations.text: Mao called Mao Tou, barbarian star, governs white clothing assembly.

sentences.zh: 畢曰罕車，為邊兵，主弋獵。

translations.text: Bi called Han Che, governs border troops, governs hunting.
Its big star beside small star is Fu Er.

sentences.zh: 附耳搖動，有讒亂臣在側。

translations.text: Fu Er shakes and moves, has slanderous rebellious ministers at side.
Mao, Bi between is Tian Jie.
Its yin, yin countries;
yang, yang countries.

Mao called Mao Tou, barbarian star, governs white clothing assembly. Bi called Han Che, governs border troops, governs hunting. Its big star beside small star is Fu Er. Fu Er shakes and moves, has slanderous rebellious ministers at side. Mao, Bi between is Tian Jie. Its yin, yin countries; yang, yang countries.
Shen is White Tiger.
Three stars straight is Heng Shi.

sentences.zh: 下有三星，兌，曰罰，為斬艾事。

translations.text: Below has three stars, Dui, called Fa, governs cutting grass affairs.
Its outer four stars, left and right shoulders and thighs.

sentences.zh: 小三星隅置，曰觜觿，為虎首，主葆旅事。

translations.text: Small three stars placed in corner, called Zi Xi, is tiger head, governs bodyguard travel affairs.
Its south has four stars, called Tian Ce.
Ce below one star, called Tian Shi.
Shi yellow then auspicious;
green, white, black, inauspicious.

sentences.zh: 其西有句曲九星，三處羅：一曰天旗，二曰天苑，三曰九游。

translations.text: Its west has hooked curved nine stars, three places spread: one called Tian Qi, two called Tian Yuan, three called Jiu You.
Its east has big star called Lang.
Lang horns change color, many bandits and thieves.
Below has four stars called Hu, straight to Lang.

sentences.zh: 狼比地有大星，曰南極老人。

translations.text: Lang compared to earth has big star, called Nan Ji Lao Ren.
Lao Ren appears, peace and security;
does not appear, troops arise.

sentences.zh: 常以秋分時候之于南郊。

translations.text: Always at autumn equinox time observe it at southern suburb.

Shen is White Tiger. Three stars straight is Heng Shi. Below has three stars, Dui, called Fa, governs cutting grass affairs. Its outer four stars, left and right shoulders and thighs. Fu Er enters Bi middle, troops arise.
Fu Er enters Bi middle, troops arise.
Northern Palace Xuan Wu, Xu, Wei.
Wei is Gai Wu;
Xu governs crying and weeping affairs.
Northern Palace Xuan Wu, Xu, Wei. Wei is Gai Wu; Xu governs crying and weeping affairs.

sentences.zh: 其南有眾星，曰羽林天軍。

translations.text: Its south has numerous stars, called Yu Lin Tian Jun.
Jun west is Lei, or called Yue.
Beside has one big star as Bei Luo.

sentences.zh: 北落若微亡，軍星動角益希，及五星犯北落，入軍，軍起。

translations.text: Bei Luo if slightly disappears, army stars move horns increasingly sparse, and five planets violate Bei Luo, enter army, army arises.
Fire, metal, water especially severe: fire, army worry;
water, water calamity;
wood, earth, army auspicious.

sentences.zh: 危東六星，兩兩相比，曰司空。

translations.text: Wei east six stars, two by two opposite, called Si Kong.

Its south has numerous stars, called Yu Lin Tian Jun. Jun west is Lei, or called Yue. Beside has one big star as Bei Luo. Bei Luo if slightly disappears, army stars move horns increasingly sparse, and five planets violate Bei Luo, enter army, army arises. Fire, metal, water especially severe: fire, army worry; water, water calamity; wood, earth, army auspicious. Wei east six stars, two by two opposite, called Si Kong.

sentences.zh: 營室為清廟，曰離宮、閣道。

translations.text: Ying Shi is Qing Miao, called Li Gong, Ge Dao.
Han middle four stars, called Tian Si.
Beside one star, called Wang Liang.
Wang Liang whips horse, chariots and cavalry fill the fields.
Beside has eight stars, cross Han, called Tian Huang.
Tian Huang beside, Jiang Xing.
Jiang Xing moves, people ford water.

Ying Shi is Qing Miao, called Li Gong, Ge Dao. Han middle four stars, called Tian Si. Beside one star, called Wang Liang. Wang Liang whips horse, chariots and cavalry fill the fields. Beside has eight stars, cross Han, called Tian Huang. Tian Huang beside, Jiang Xing. Jiang Xing moves, people ford water.
Chu, Jiu four stars, in Wei south.

sentences.zh: 匏瓜，有青黑星守之，魚鹽貴。

translations.text: Pao Gua, has green black star guards it, fish and salt expensive.
Chu, Jiu four stars, in Wei south. Pao Gua, has green black star guards it, fish and salt expensive.
Nan Dou is Miao, its north Jian Xing.
Jian Xing is flag.
Qian Niu is Xi Sheng.
Its north He Gu.
He Gu big star, Shang Jiang;
left and right, left and right Jiang.
Wu Nu, its north Zhi Nu.
Zhi Nu is Heavenly Maiden's grandson.

Nan Dou is Miao, its north Jian Xing. Jian Xing is flag. Qian Niu is Xi Sheng. Its north He Gu. He Gu big star, Shang Jiang; left and right, left and right Jiang. Wu Nu, its north Zhi Nu. Zhi Nu is Heavenly Maiden's grandson.

sentences.zh: 察日、月之行以揆歲星順逆。

translations.text: Observe sun, moon's movement to gauge Sui Xing's forward and reverse.
Called Eastern Wood, governs spring, days Jia Yi.
Righteousness lost, punishment emerges from Sui Xing.
Sui Xing winning contracting, by its lodging names the country.

sentences.zh: 所在國不可伐，可以罰人。

translations.text: Its location country cannot be attacked, can punish people.

sentences.zh: 其趨舍而前曰贏，退舍曰縮。

translations.text: Its hastening lodging and advancing called winning, retreating lodging called contracting.
Winning, its country has troops not returning;

sentences.zh: 縮，其國有憂，將亡，國傾敗。

translations.text: contracting, its country has worry, will perish, country tilts and defeats.

sentences.zh: 其所在，五星皆從而聚於一舍，其下之國可以義致天下。

translations.text: Its location, five planets all follow and gather at one lodge, its below country can by righteousness summon the world.

Observe sun, moon's movement to gauge Sui Xing's forward and reverse. Called Eastern Wood, governs spring, days Jia Yi. Righteousness lost, punishment emerges from Sui Xing. Sui Xing winning contracting, by its lodging names the country. Its location country cannot be attacked, can punish people. Its hastening lodging and advancing called winning, retreating lodging called contracting. Winning, its country has troops not returning; contracting, its country has worry, will perish, country tilts and defeats. Its location, five planets all follow and gather at one lodge, its below country can by righteousness summon the world.

sentences.zh: 以攝提格歲：歲陰左行在寅，歲星右轉居丑。

translations.text: With She Ti Ge year: year yin left walks in yin, Sui Xing right turns resides in chou.

sentences.zh: 正月，與斗、牽牛晨出東方，名曰監德。

translations.text: First month, with Dou, Qian Niu morning emerges eastern, named Jian De.
Color green green has light.
Its disorder sequence, has response appears Liu.
Year early, water;
late, drought.

With She Ti Ge year: year yin left walks in yin, Sui Xing right turns resides in chou. First month, with Dou, Qian Niu morning emerges eastern, named Jian De. Color green green has light. Its disorder sequence, has response appears Liu. Year early, water; late, drought.

sentences.zh: 歲星出，東行十二度，百日而止，反逆行；

translations.text: Sui Xing emerges, east walks twelve degrees, hundred days then stops, reverses;
reverses eight degrees, hundred days, again east walks.

sentences.zh: 歲行三十度十六分度之七，率日行十二分度之一，十二歲而周天。

translations.text: Sui walks thirty degrees sixteen parts degree seven, rate daily walks twelve parts degree one, twelve years cycles heaven.
Emerges always eastern, uses morning;
enters western, uses dusk.

Sui Xing emerges, east walks twelve degrees, hundred days then stops, reverses; reverses eight degrees, hundred days, again east walks. Sui walks thirty degrees sixteen parts degree seven, rate daily walks twelve parts degree one, twelve years cycles heaven. Emerges always eastern, uses morning; enters western, uses dusk.

sentences.zh: 單閼歲：歲陰在卯，星居子。

translations.text: Shan He year: year yin in mao, star resides in zi.

sentences.zh: 以二月與婺女、虛、危晨出，曰降入。

translations.text: With second month with Wu Nu, Xu, Wei morning emerges, called Jiang Ru.
Very has light.
Its disorder sequence, has response appears Zhang.
Named Jiang Ru its year great water.

Shan He year: year yin in mao, star resides in zi. With second month with Wu Nu, Xu, Wei morning emerges, called Jiang Ru. Very has light. Its disorder sequence, has response appears Zhang. Named Jiang Ru its year great water.

sentences.zh: 執徐歲：歲陰在辰，星居亥。

translations.text: Zhi Xu year: year yin in chen, star resides in hai.

sentences.zh: 以三月［居］與營室、東壁晨出，曰青章。

translations.text: With third month resides with Ying Shi, Dong Bi morning emerges, called Qing Zhang.
Green green very bright.
Its disorder sequence;
has response appears Zhen.
Called Qing Zhang year early, drought;
late, water.

Zhi Xu year: year yin in chen, star resides in hai. With third month resides with Ying Shi, Dong Bi morning emerges, called Qing Zhang. Green green very bright. Its disorder sequence; has response appears Zhen. Called Qing Zhang year early, drought; late, water.

sentences.zh: 大荒駱歲：歲陰在巳，星居戌。

translations.text: Da Huang Luo year: year yin in si, star resides in xu.

sentences.zh: 以四月與奎、婁［胃昴］晨出，曰跰踵。

translations.text: With fourth month with Kui, Lou Wei Mao morning emerges, called Pan Zhong.
Bear bear red color, has light.
Its disorder sequence, has response appears Kang.

Da Huang Luo year: year yin in si, star resides in xu. With fourth month with Kui, Lou Wei Mao morning emerges, called Pan Zhong. Bear bear red color, has light. Its disorder sequence, has response appears Kang.

sentences.zh: 敦牂歲：歲陰在午，星居酉。

translations.text: Dun Zhang year: year yin in wu, star resides in you.

sentences.zh: 以五月與胃、昴、畢晨出，曰開明。

translations.text: With fifth month with Wei, Mao, Bi morning emerges, called Kai Ming.
Fiery fiery has light.
Cease troops;
Only benefits duke and king, not beneficial for governing troops.
Its disorder sequence, has response appears Fang.
Year early, drought;
late, water.

Cease troops; Only benefits duke and king, not beneficial for governing troops. Its disorder sequence, has response appears Fang. Year early, drought; late, water.

sentences.zh: 協洽歲：歲陰在未，星居申。

translations.text: Xie Qia year: year yin in wei, star resides in shen.

sentences.zh: 以六月與觜觿、參晨出，曰長列。

translations.text: With sixth month with Zi Xi, Shen morning emerges, called Chang Lie.
Bright bright has light.
Benefits deploying troops.
Its disorder sequence, has response appears Ji.

Xie Qia year: year yin in wei, star resides in shen. With sixth month with Zi Xi, Shen morning emerges, called Chang Lie. Bright bright has light. Benefits deploying troops. Its disorder sequence, has response appears Ji.

sentences.zh: 涒灘歲：歲陰在申，星居未。

translations.text: Zong Tan year: year yin in shen, star resides in wei.

sentences.zh: 以七月與東井、輿鬼晨出，曰大音。

translations.text: With seventh month with Dong Jing, Yu Gui morning emerges, called Da Yin.
Bright bright white.
Its disorder sequence, has response appears Qian Niu.

Zong Tan year: year yin in shen, star resides in wei. With seventh month with Dong Jing, Yu Gui morning emerges, called Da Yin. Bright bright white. Its disorder sequence, has response appears Qian Niu.

sentences.zh: 作鄂歲：歲陰在酉，星居午。

translations.text: Zuo E year: year yin in you, star resides in wu.

sentences.zh: 以八月與柳、七星、張晨出，曰（為）長王。

translations.text: With eighth month with Liu, Seven Stars, Zhang morning emerges, called Chang Wang.
